item.title: Gareth Gates - Anyone Of Us (Stupid Mistake)
item.description:
I’ve been letting you
down down
Girl I know
I’ve been such a fool
Giving in
to temptation
When I should’ve
played it cool
The situation got
out of hand
I hope you understand
it can happen to
Anyone of us
anyone you think of
Anyone can fall
anyone can hurt

hearts will break

a stupid mistake

anyone of us

say you will
